name: Avoid using jQuery deprecated methods
description:
Be careful when using deprecated methods. The deprecation period should be used to smoothly make the transition. The rule raises an issue when any of the following methods is used:
- .andSelf()
- .context
- .die()
- .error()
- jQuery.boxModel
- jQuery.browser
- jQuery.sub()
- jQuery.support
- .live()
- .load()
- .selector
- .size()
- .toggle()
- .unload()
This rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCMM-MNT-20 recommendation.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Using deprecated jQuery API could lead to security compliancy issues.
total: Number of JQuery artifacts (Javascript source code containing JQuery)
